title: Top Bitcoin Price Predictions as BTC Soars Above $87.5K
body: TL;DR Bitcoin’s jump to $87,500 has sparked bullish calls from top analysts, with some predicting a further rally in the short term. While past cycle comparisons suggest more upside, the overheated RSI hints that a short-term cooldown might come first. BTC on the Move Bitcoin’s price remained relatively stable over the past several days, hovering around $84,000-$85,000. However, the new business week kicked off on the right foot, with its valuation jumping above $87,500. BTC Price, Source: CoinGecko The surge caught the eye of numerous industry participants, some of whom believe a further rally could be brewing. Scott Melker (the host of The Wolf of All Streets Podcast) told his one million followers on X that BTC has been “breaking through descending resistance from the all-time high.” He claimed the price needs to spike beyond $88,804 “to break the series of lower highs and lower lows.” The X user JAVON MARKS chipped in, too. They suggested that BTC has invalidated a falling wedge pattern with its latest price pump, pointing out that this has resulted in a massive rally in the past. For their part, 0xNobler believes “the Golden Bull Run” could start this week. They think BTC has yet to mirror its positive performance from the 2020-2021 and 2016-2017 cycles, envisioning an ascent to as high as $200,000. In addition, the analyst forecasted that many altcoins “are set to pump 150-200x.” What Are Indicators Signaling? Some important metrics also suggest that BTC’s price could be on the verge of a further increase. The asset’s exchange netflow , for instance, has been negative in the past week, suggesting a shift from centralized platforms toward self-custody methods. This could be viewed as a bullish factor in the short term since it reduces the immediate selling pressure. BTC Exchange Netflow, Source: CryptoQuant Meanwhile, the renowned analyst Ali Martinez recently reminded that BTC market peaks have historically coincided with surges in retail activity. He said the rise from $70,000 to the ATH of $110,000 ( observed in January this year) lacked that, hinting that the market top has yet to be reached . Despite the bullish sentiment across the community, one indicator points to a potential pullback in the near future. This is the Relative Strength Index (RSI), a momentum oscillator that tracks the speed and magnitude of recent price changes. It varies from 0 to 100, and readings above 70 are considered bearish since they signal that the asset could have entered overbought territory. Currently, the ratio stands at approximately 73. The post Top Bitcoin Price Predictions as BTC Soars Above $87.5K appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Decoding Crypto Fear: Is the Slight Rise in Fear & Greed Index a False Dawn?
body: Are you feeling the pulse of the crypto market? The ever-fluctuating world of cryptocurrencies keeps us all on our toes, trying to decipher whether we should be cautiously optimistic or bracing for a downturn. One crucial tool that helps gauge the overall market sentiment is the Crypto Fear & Greed Index . Let’s dive into the latest readings and understand what they signify for your crypto journey. Crypto Fear & Greed Index: A Glimmer of Hope or Just a Mirage? As of April 21st, the Crypto Fear & Greed Index , a well-known metric provided by Alternative.me, nudged upwards to 39. This is a two-point increase from the previous day, offering a tiny sliver of optimism. However, before you start popping champagne bottles, it’s essential to note that despite this uptick, the index remains firmly entrenched in the ‘Fear’ zone. This consistent ‘Fear’ sentiment prompts a crucial question: Is this a temporary blip or a sign of underlying market anxiety? The index operates on a scale from 0 to 100. Let’s break down what these numbers truly represent: 0-24: Extreme Fear – This zone typically indicates a market ripe for potential buying opportunities. When fear is rampant, prices are often suppressed, presenting chances to acquire assets at lower valuations. 25-49: Fear – Still a cautious zone, ‘Fear’ suggests investors are apprehensive, possibly due to recent market corrections or negative news. While not as extreme as the lowest range, it still reflects a bearish sentiment. 50-74: Greed – As the index climbs into ‘Greed’, it signals growing market confidence. Investors are becoming more optimistic, potentially driving prices upwards. 75-100: Extreme Greed – This is the ‘danger zone’. ‘Extreme Greed’ often precedes market corrections. It indicates a bubble-like scenario where excessive optimism can lead to irrational buying and inflated prices. Decoding the Components: What Drives the Crypto Fear & Greed Index? The Crypto Fear & Greed Index isn’t just a random number generator. It’s a composite index, meticulously calculated by analyzing six key market indicators. Understanding these components gives us a deeper insight into the factors influencing market sentiment. Let’s break down each element: Volatility (25%): Volatility measures the rapid price fluctuations in the crypto market, particularly Bitcoin. High volatility often breeds fear as investors become uncertain about price stability. The index analyzes the current volatility and compares it with 30-day and 90-day averages. Market Momentum/Volume (25%): This factor examines market momentum and trading volume relative to the 30-day and 90-day averages. Strong buying momentum and high volume typically indicate greed, while weak momentum and low volume can suggest fear. Social Media (15%): Social media sentiment plays a significant role in today’s markets. The index analyzes social media platforms for crypto-related hashtags and keywords, gauging the overall tone – positive or negative – of online conversations. Surveys (15%): While less prominent than other factors, periodic crypto surveys gauge investor sentiment directly. These surveys ask participants about their market outlook, contributing to the overall index score. Bitcoin Dominance (10%): Bitcoin’s dominance in the crypto market reflects investor preference for Bitcoin versus altcoins. Increased Bitcoin dominance can sometimes indicate a ‘flight to safety’ during fearful times, while decreasing dominance might suggest a higher risk appetite and greed. Google Trends (10%): Google Trends data for Bitcoin-related search queries provides insights into general public interest in crypto. Spikes in searches can indicate either increased fear of missing out (FOMO) during greedy periods or panic selling during fearful times. Why Does the ‘Fear’ Zone Persist Despite the Slight Increase in Crypto Fear & Greed Index? The slight two-point rise in the Crypto Fear & Greed Index is a minor positive shift, but the persistent presence in the ‘Fear’ zone highlights ongoing market anxieties. Several factors could be contributing to this: Macroeconomic Uncertainty: Global economic factors, such as inflation, interest rate hikes, and geopolitical tensions, heavily influence investor sentiment across all markets, including crypto. Uncertainty in these areas can fuel fear. Regulatory Scrutiny: Ongoing regulatory discussions and actions surrounding cryptocurrencies create uncertainty and apprehension among investors. Negative regulatory news can quickly trigger fear in the market. Recent Market Corrections: Recent price corrections and market volatility can leave a lingering sense of caution, making investors hesitant to become overly bullish, even after minor positive price movements. Altcoin Performance: While Bitcoin might show some stability, the performance of altcoins also contributes to the overall sentiment. If altcoins are experiencing significant downturns, it can drag the index down, even if Bitcoin shows signs of improvement. Navigating Market Fear: Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors So, what should crypto investors do when the Crypto Fear & Greed Index hovers in the ‘Fear’ zone? Here are some actionable insights: Exercise Caution, Not Panic: Fear can be contagious. While the ‘Fear’ zone suggests caution, it’s crucial to avoid panic selling based solely on the index. Make informed decisions based on your own research and risk tolerance. Identify Potential Buying Opportunities: Historically, periods of ‘Fear’ and ‘Extreme Fear’ have presented attractive buying opportunities. When the market is fearful, assets can be undervalued. Consider dollar-cost averaging into your favorite cryptocurrencies during these times. Review Your Portfolio: Market fear is a good time to review your portfolio allocation. Ensure your portfolio aligns with your long-term investment goals and risk appetite. Rebalance if necessary. Stay Informed: Keep abreast of market news, regulatory developments, and macroeconomic trends. Understanding the factors driving market sentiment empowers you to make more informed decisions. Focus on Long-Term Fundamentals: In times of fear, it’s easy to get caught up in short-term price fluctuations. Re-center your focus on the long-term fundamentals of the projects you’re invested in. Strong projects with solid use cases are more likely to weather market storms. Conclusion: Interpreting the Crypto Fear & Greed Index for Informed Decisions The Crypto Fear & Greed Index serves as a valuable tool for understanding the prevailing sentiment in the cryptocurrency market. While the recent slight increase to 39 offers a glimmer of hope, the continued presence in the ‘Fear’ zone underscores the need for cautious optimism. By understanding the components of the index, recognizing the factors driving market sentiment, and adopting a strategic approach, crypto investors can navigate market fluctuations more effectively and make informed decisions, regardless of whether the needle points towards fear or greed. Remember, market sentiment is just one piece of the puzzle – thorough research and a long-term perspective are your best allies in the dynamic world of crypto investing. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: US Dollar Index Plunges to 3-Year Low as Gold Hits ATH, BTC Tops $87K
body: The US Dollar Index (DXY) has fallen to its lowest level for three years as the world’s reserve currency depreciates under the weight of escalating global trade tensions instigated by President Trump. DXY, which is a measure of the greenback against a basket of six leading currencies, has fallen to 98.23, its lowest level since March 2022, according to TradingView. “The dollar Index is below 98.5, a new three-year low. This is getting serious,” said gold investor Peter Schiff on April 21. BREAKING : U.S. Dollar U.S. Dollar Index $DXY plunging to its lowest level since March 2022 pic.twitter.com/NPqqcthqTz — Barchart (@Barchart) April 21, 2025 DYX Down 10%, Gold Up The Index has retreated more than 10% since the beginning of this year as Trump’s trade tariffs have weakened the currency alongside investor sentiment for the United States. However, it saw a similar decline between October and December 2022 when it fell from 114 to 101 as the greenback depreciated. This dip has been deeper, however, with more pain predicted if trade deals are not made fast. The euro is above $1.15, and the dollar has also fallen below 141 Japanese yen and 0.81 Swiss francs in a 14-year low, observed Schiff. Gold is up over $50, hitting a record high of $3,380. The euro is above $1.15. The dollar has also fallen below 141 Japanese yen and .81 Swiss francs (a new 14-year low, just 3% above a record low.) The dollar Index is below 98.5, a new three-year low. This is getting serious. — Peter Schiff (@PeterSchiff) April 21, 2025 Meanwhile, gold prices have hit another all-time high of $3,380 per ounce, he added. The usually slow-moving precious yellow metal has gained a whopping 29% in dollar terms since the beginning of this year as investors flock to safe havens amid the currency crisis. BTC Hits 4-Week High Meanwhile, Bitcoin appears to have decoupled from tech stocks and realigned with gold, surged 2.5% on the day to reclaim a four-week high of $87,550 during the Monday morning trading session in Asia. Bitcoin appears to be holding gains, trading at $87,400 at the time of writing rather than bouncing back down off resistance. However, it needs to clear the $88,500 level it reached in late March to see a larger move into the $90K range. “I’m open to the possibility that it may be finally happening. Bitcoin taking on its final form. Either that or somebody is levering up on longs for some other reason,” said economist Alex Krüger. He also suggested that investors in Asia were viewing Bitcoin as a safe haven, whereas those in the US were speculating with it as a risk asset. Asians buying bitcoin as a safe haven, Americans trading bitcoin as a risk asset? (Asia in yellow, US in blue) pic.twitter.com/6cSTL1094y — Alex Krüger (@krugermacro) April 21, 2025 The post US Dollar Index Plunges to 3-Year Low as Gold Hits ATH, BTC Tops $87K appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Bitcoin Surpasses $87,000 After a Long Break! Analysts Warn! Here Are the Details
body: Bitcoin (BTC) has broken above the $87,000 level for the first time in more than two weeks, driven by increased global liquidity and renewed institutional appetite. Bitcoin Surpasses $87,000 on Global Liquidity Surge, But Analysts Say Bull Run Is Early But analysts caution that it is too early to say a new bull market has begun as macroeconomic uncertainties continue to weigh on sentiment. Bitcoin was trading at $87,525, up more than 2.4% in the past 24 hours. The move marked a sharp recovery from earlier this month, when BTC fell to $74,500 following market jitters sparked by U.S. President Donald Trump’s aggressive tariff proposals. Liquidity and Institutions Drive Demand Kronos Research analyst Dominick John attributed the recent surge to the increase in global M2 money supply and institutional accumulation, particularly by Michael Saylor, who recently announced that he purchased 3,459 BTC. “Bitcoin’s rise above $87,000, the increase in global liquidity… and renewed institutional interest are tightening the available supply,” John said, citing data showing that global M2 supply in the US, Europe, Japan and China reached $90.2 trillion between December and February. Strategy, which has continued to defend Bitcoin despite reporting $5.91 billion in unrealized losses on its BTC holdings in Q1, has remained publicly bullish. “Bitcoin has no counterparty risk… Not even chaos,” Saylor wrote in a piece on X. Meanwhile, US spot Bitcoin ETFs recorded net inflows of $15.8 million last week, indicating growing confidence among institutional players compared to the cautious sentiment seen in February and early March. Other cryptocurrencies followed Bitcoin’s lead, albeit with mixed results. Ethereum (ETH) rose 0.97% to $1,656, while XRP climbed 1.38% to $2.13. However, Solana (SOL) fell 0.87% to $140.20. Despite the rally, analysts remain cautious. Ongoing U.S. trade talks remain a major source of uncertainty, said Peter Chung, research director at Presto Research. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Bitcoin Surpasses $87,000 After a Long Break! Analysts Warn! Here Are the Details

title: BNB, SOL, XRP Spike Higher as Bitcoin 'Digital Gold' Narrative Makes a Comeback
body: Surging gold prices and bitcoin’s (BTC) relatively strong price action amid a global market sell-off have some traders revisiting the latter’s role as “digital gold” — a big narrative in bitcoin’s early years but one that has lost steam in recent times. BTC zoomed above $87,000 in Asian morning hours, with Cardano’s ADA, BNB Chain’s BNB, XRP and ether (ETH) adding as much as 1.5%. The spike reversed all declines since Thursday, with tokens such as Solana’s SOL up 5.2% in the past week. The tariff-driven trade wars have sparked fears of inflation and currency devaluation, prompting comparisons of the asset to gold’s historical role as a hedge. “Although bitcoin has had a close correlation with U.S. equities, it seems to be changing with a stronger tie to the rise of the price of gold, which has been a safe haven while equities have plummeted,” Nick Ruck, director at LVRG Research, told CoinDesk in a Telegram message on Monday. “Bitcoin crossed $87,000 as a sign of renewed investor confidence as the market continues to stabilize after panicking over tariffs. It’s also worth noting that Bitcoin's digital gold narrative is taking off as both assets have grown in tandem,” Ruck said. Gold set fresh highs Monday with a push above $3,380 per ounce, bringing year-to-date gains to 25%. Bitcoin has dropped more than 20% from a January peak of $108,000, though Monday’s push over $87,000 sent the asset to its highest level since Donald Trump’s “liberation day” in early April. Pressure on the greenback has continued to grow as the dollar index (DXY) crashed to a three-year low, with some pointing out that most bad news has been “priced in” and that bitcoin could see upside in the coming days. “Trump's inclination to remove Jerome Powell as Fed Chair and force interest rate cuts is causing people to sell the U.S. dollar and U.S. government debt, moving to other safe haven assets such as gold, European bonds, and now, Bitcoin,” Jeff Mei, COO at BTSE, told CoinDesk in a Telegram message Monday. “After all, when rates are cut, more money flows into the money supply, devaluing the U.S. dollar. In general, downward pressure on the US dollar is growing and this could be a driving catalyst for Bitcoin to become a safe haven asset,” Mei added. Meanwhile, here’s a machine’s view of the markets today, powered by the CoinDesk Markets AI bot. ADA Price Analysis Cardano’s ADA is above 63 cents with strong technical indicators pointing to continued upward momentum despite macroeconomic headwinds. title: Flipster Review 2025: Features, Verified Facts & Honest Verdict for Crypto Traders
body: The post Flipster Review 2025: Features, Verified Facts & Honest Verdict for Crypto Traders appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Flipster is a cryptocurrency exchange that launched in 2021 and has quickly gained popularity in the crypto trading community. The platform offers a wide selection of perpetual futures contracts alongside options for spot trading. With over one million users and a monthly trading volume exceeding $20 billion, Flipster also operates in over 200 countries. The exchange provides more than 350 perpetual contracts, catering to traders interested in perpetual futures trading, despite a more limited selection of spot trading pairs. To enhance user experience, Flipster includes passive APR rewards in its Earn Campaign, a Launchpool to stake and earn rewards, and various reward programs. Flipster is a platform that is appealing to both beginner and advanced traders alike because of the ease of use of its user interface and its zero-fee trading option. Website: https://www.flipster.io/en Headquarters: Panama Year Launched: 2021 Supported Cryptocurrencies: BTC, ETH, XRP, DOGE, USDT, USDC, and 350+ others Supported Countries: Flipster serves users in over 200 countries worldwide. However, it does not support users from certain countries, including the United States, China, Iran, Nigeria, and several others, due to regulatory restrictions. Fiat Support: None (crypto-only platform) Deposit Methods: Direct crypto deposits only Security Certifications: ISO/IEC 27001 Certified Customer Support: 24/7 live chat & ticket system Trading Pairs: 350+ Native Token: None (Flipster currently does not have a native token) Regulatory Compliance: Operates under KYC/AML compliance, GDPR-aligned data privacy practices Languages Supported: English Overall Thoughts on Flipster In a short period of time, Flipster has made a significant impact in the crypto trading industry, particularly for users interested in perpetual futures trading. The platform’s zero-fee trading is a distinctive feature that allows traders to maximize their profits. With access to over 350 perpetual contracts, traders have numerous opportunities to diversify their trading portfolios. However, there are some areas that could be improved. For example, the spot trading option is currently limited to six cryptocurrencies as of writing, which may not meet the needs of traders looking for a broader selection. Furthermore, the compulsory identity verification procedure might pose a barrier to some users, and the lack of fiat on-ramps could deter new traders or beginners from entering the cryptocurrency market. Key Features and Advantages of Flipster Wide Variety of Perpetual Futures Contracts: Access to over 350 perpetual futures contracts, including major cryptocurrencies and trending altcoins. Zero Trading Fees: No perpetual futures trading and spot trading fees, enhancing profitability. High Liquidity: Ensures instant order execution and tight spreads. User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design suitable for all experience levels. Mobile Accessibility: Trade on the go with dedicated Android and iOS apps. Instant Flip: Enables one-tap reversal of direction for crypto perpetual futures trading. Time Trigger Orders: Schedule market orders to execute automatically at a specific date and time. Social Trading: Users can set up a social profile, link their social media accounts and share their trading activity. Users can gain visibility on leaderboards and follow top traders to learn from their trading strategies . Earn Campaign: Earn up to 22% APR on supported cryptocurrencies. Rewards Hub: Welcome rewards for new users. Earn up to 150 USDT. Launchpool: Boost earnings by staking crypto. Reward Programs: Benefit from VIP, affiliate, and referral programs. Security Measures: Robust security protocols, including Proof of Reserves and Merkle Tree self-verification for transparency. Disadvantages of Flipster Limited Spot Trading Selection: Only six cryptocurrencies are available for spot trading at the moment. Mandatory Identity Verification: Users must complete identity verification before accessing any trading features. No Fiat On-Ramp: Lack of support for fiat currency deposits may be inconvenient for some users.​ What Services Does Flipster Offer? Trading Perpetual Futures : The Flipster platform has over 350 perpetual futures contracts available with leverage options up to 100x for major and niche markets. Spot Trading : Buy and sell selected cryptocurrencies that are highly liquid and execute trades instantly. Flipster Earn : Earn passive income on USDT, BTC and ETH at competitive APR with no lockup period. Earnings are distributed daily into the users’ wallets automatically. Trade while earning rewards simultaneously on USDT assets. Rewards Hub : Welcome rewards for new users. New users can earn up to 150 USDT. They can earn an additional 10 USDT bonus when completing all tasks within 30 days. Launchpool : Stake crypto and earn rewards. Users can get multiplied rewards by increasing their trading volume. Rewards Programs: Save even further by taking advantage of their VIP , affiliate , and referral programs. Mobile Trading: Trade on the go using Flipster’s mobile trading app, available on Android and iOS . Instant Flip : A tool that allows users to close their current position and initiate a new one in the opposite direction, all with a single tap. It is useful in managing risk, especially during sudden market reversals. Time Trigger Orders : Users can schedule market orders to be executed automatically at specific dates and times. This is vital for seizing opportunities around key market events or trading during off-hours. Social Trading : A community-driven approach to crypto trading. Designed to help users discover top global trades and grow their influence. Users can set up a social profile, link social media accounts, and share their trading performance to gain followers. Flipster Blog : Discover the latest news, and educational content on a variety of crypto-related topics. Flipster Glossary : Users can learn and explore commonly used crypto terms and jargon. Unlike many exchanges that charge maker/taker fees, Flipster has adopted a zero trading fee model for all crypto trades, along with deep liquidity and real-time performance analytics in a streamlined interface. Whether you’re flipping short-term market trends or managing long-term positions, the platform is designed for speed, efficiency, and usability. Origins of Flipster Flipster started as AQX in June 2020, short for “Access, Quality, and Xtraordinary.” The platform was created to address two common crypto trading issues of limited risk protection and poor liquidity. AQX launched its public beta on May 18, 2022. In July 2023, the platform rebranded as Flipster to emphasize a more engaging and user-friendly trading experience. Since the rebranding, Flipster has experienced rapid growth, offering more than 350 perpetual futures contracts and serving users in more than 200 countries. How Does Flipster Handle Security Risks? In the era of digital trading, security breaches, unfortunately, occur from time to time, and even major platforms like Binance are not immune. For instance, in 2019, Binance experienced a security breach that resulted in the theft of 7,000 BTC. The key question becomes – how does a platform respond? Flipster has gone above and beyond to protect users. To date, Flipster has not reported any external hacks or Maximal Extractable Value (MEV) attacks. While no external attacks have occurred, Flipster continuously enhances security through encryption, two-factor authentication (2FA), and regular audits. The platform partners with Fireblocks for cold storage solutions and conducts thorough reviews of its internal controls to stay ahead of emerging threats. Security Enhancements Flipster follows strict Know Your Customer (KYC) and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) protocols, which require every user to submit identification documents, such as a passport, ID card, or driver’s license—and typically a selfie or live verification before they can deposit or withdraw funds. This verification process can be completed directly within the app, thanks to an integration with Sumsub that streamlines the experience. Once users upload their documents and receive approval (which usually occurs quickly, with an email notification sent upon approval), they can start trading. While some may find mandatory KYC procedures inconvenient, Flipster has made the process relatively quick and effective, enhancing security by preventing bad actors from using the platform. Flipster protects user funds using industry-standard measures through Proof of Reserves (PoR) . They regularly publish audits that show all customer assets are fully backed 1:1 by reserves. This allows users to check that their account balances are included and confirms that Flipster does not use fractional reserves. PoR ensures that if all users decide to withdraw their funds, Flipster can process every request. This is important, especially after recent industry collapses. By frequently updating the Proof of Reserves, Flipster shows accountability and reassures users that their money is safe and securely held. Additionally, users can verify their account balance via the Merkle Tree self-verification tool on Flipster. Flipster is committed to securing user information and digital assets beyond the measures already mentioned. In December of 2024, Flipster achieved ISO/IEC 27001 certification, which is widely recognized for establishing high standards in information security management for organizations. The security measures implemented by Flipster demonstrate their relentless dedication to protecting users’ data and assets in an increasingly complex digital world. In addition to being an ISO/IEC 27001 certified organization, Flipster has partnered with Fireblocks to secure digital assets in cold storage, ensuring they are safely held offline. The platform implements two-factor authentication (2FA) for an extra level of protection and includes end-to-end encryption, keeping user data secure. Flipster enlists third-party security experts to conduct regular reviews and audits of its security measures, ensuring compliance with international industry standards. Role-based access control (RBAC) is employed to limit access to sensitive data based on employees’ roles. Additionally, Flipster has a response plan for security incidents that outlines procedures for emergency responses in case of a breach, while adhering to global privacy and protection laws, including GDPR. Through these comprehensive security measures and its robust response plan, Flipster is committed to creating and protecting a safe and reliable environment for users to trade and manage their assets. Reference links for the security section of the article: Flipster Achieves ISO/IEC 27001:2022 Certification Flipster Integrates Fireblocks to Strengthen its Exchange Security Flipster Achievements in 2024 Massive Growth in Trading Volume: Increased from $12 billion to $117 billion — a remarkable 856% rise. Assets Under Management: Jumped from $1.2 million to $78 million — reflecting a 6,000% increase. Perpetual Futures Expansion: Added 144 new listings, totalling over 300 cryptocurrencies available for leveraged trading. Zero-Fee Spot Trading: Introduced fee-free spot trading, allowing seamless switching between spot and perpetual markets. Earn Campaign Launched: Users can earn up to 22% APR on USDT, BTC, and ETH without any lock-in period. Recurring Buy Feature: Enabled automated crypto purchases on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis to support dollar-cost averaging. Strategic Partnerships: BNB Chain: Enabled fee-free stablecoin withdrawals and APR boosts. Tether: Introduced Tether Gold (XAU₮) and launched campaigns with up to 24% APR. TON Network: Added USDT TON network support and co-hosted the NOVEMBULL Event to promote web3 innovation. These accomplishments underscore Flipster’s rapid growth and continued commitment to innovation and user-focused development. Source: Flipster 2024 Wrapped Overall Pros and Cons of Flipster Pros Zero Trading Fees Flipster offers zero trading fees on both perpetual contracts and spot trading, making it cost-effective for traders.​ Wide Variety of Perpetual Futures Contracts With over 350 perpetual futures trading pairs, Flipster provides a wide range of options for futures traders.​ High Liquidity and Instant Execution The platform boasts high liquidity and instant order execution, facilitating efficient trading experiences. User-Friendly Interface Flipster features a clean, easy-to-use interface, suitable for both beginners and experienced traders.​ Mobile App Availability Dedicated mobile apps for Android and iOS allow users to trade on the go.​ Reward Programs Users can earn passive rewards of up to 22% APR and participate in VIP, affiliate, and referral programs.​ Launchpool Access Flipster’s Launchpool offers early access to new coins, providing additional earning opportunities.​ Proof of Reserves Transparency The platform maintains transparency with Proof of Reserves, ensuring user funds are verifiable.​ Cons Limited Spot Trading Selection Flipster offers only six cryptocurrencies for spot trading at the moment, which may be limiting for some users.​ Mandatory Identity Verification Users must complete identity verification before accessing any trading features, which can be a hurdle for some.​ No Fiat On-Ramp The platform does not support fiat currency deposits, requiring users to deposit cryptocurrency to begin trading.​

title: Crucial Crypto Market Events: Uncover This Week’s Economic Calendar
body: In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency, staying ahead of the curve is paramount. It’s not just about understanding blockchain technology or the latest meme coin; it’s also about keeping a close eye on broader economic indicators that can send ripples through the crypto market. This week is shaping up to be particularly eventful on the economic front, with several key announcements and speeches scheduled that could significantly influence crypto market events . Are you prepared for the potential shifts? Navigating Crypto Market Events This Week The traditional financial markets and the burgeoning crypto sphere are more interconnected than ever. Economic events that move the needle in traditional finance often have a cascading effect on digital assets. This week, we’re focusing on a series of announcements and speeches that deserve your attention. Let’s break down the key dates and times to mark on your calendar, all in UTC for your convenience: Tuesday, April 22 13:30 UTC: U.S. FOMC Member Harker Speaks – Patrick Harker’s insights into the Federal Reserve’s perspective on the economy are always closely watched. His commentary can provide clues about future monetary policy, which directly impacts investment sentiment across all markets, including crypto. 14:00 UTC: EUR ECB President Lagarde Speaks – Christine Lagarde’s remarks on the Eurozone economy are equally significant. Given the global nature of financial markets, developments in the Eurozone can indirectly influence crypto markets, particularly for those assets paired against EUR. Wednesday, April 23 13:30 UTC: U.S. Fed Waller Speaks – Christopher Waller’s perspectives as a Fed Governor are highly valued. His speech offers another opportunity to gauge the Fed’s thinking and potential future actions. Pay close attention to any hints about inflation, interest rates, or economic growth, as these are crucial drivers for market volatility events in crypto. Thursday, April 24 12:30 UTC: U.S. Initial Jobless Claims – This is a critical piece of data reflecting the health of the U.S. labor market. Higher than expected jobless claims can signal economic weakness, potentially leading to a risk-off sentiment that might affect crypto. Conversely, lower claims can suggest a robust economy, which could be interpreted positively by the markets. The jobless claims impact is often immediate and noticeable. 21:00 UTC: U.S. FOMC Member Kashkari Speaks – Neel Kashkari, another influential voice from the FOMC, will be speaking late in the day. His views, especially following the jobless claims data, could provide further clarity on the Fed’s stance and potential market direction. Decoding Federal Reserve Speakers and Their Crypto Market Impact Why are speeches from federal reserve speakers so important for the crypto market? The answer lies in the Fed’s influence on monetary policy. Here’s a breakdown: Interest Rate Expectations: Statements from Fed officials can heavily influence expectations about future interest rate hikes or cuts. Higher interest rates generally make riskier assets like cryptocurrencies less attractive compared to safer, yield-bearing investments. Inflation Outlook: The Fed’s view on inflation is critical. If speakers suggest inflation is persistent and requires aggressive measures, this can lead to market uncertainty and potential downturns, impacting crypto negatively. Conversely, if they signal inflation is cooling down, it could boost market confidence. Economic Growth Signals: Fed speakers often provide insights into the overall health of the U.S. economy. Concerns about economic slowdown or recession can trigger risk aversion, leading investors to pull back from volatile assets like crypto. Market Sentiment: Beyond specific policy signals, the overall tone and sentiment conveyed by Fed speakers can shape market mood. Hawkish (inflation-fighting) tones can induce caution, while dovish (growth-supporting) tones might encourage risk-taking. Keep an eye on the nuances of their speeches. Are they hinting at future rate cuts? Are they expressing concerns about persistent inflation? Are they optimistic or pessimistic about economic growth? These are the questions crypto investors should be asking and seeking answers for. Jobless Claims and Crypto Volatility: What to Expect? The weekly U.S. Initial Jobless Claims report is more than just a labor market statistic; it’s a potential catalyst for market volatility events , including in the crypto space. Here’s why: Jobless Claims Data Potential Crypto Market Reaction Explanation Higher than Expected Claims Potentially Negative Signals economic weakness, increased unemployment, and potential recessionary pressures. Investors might move away from risk assets like crypto towards safer havens. Lower than Expected Claims Potentially Positive Suggests a strong labor market and a healthy economy. This can boost overall market confidence and potentially support risk assets like crypto. In Line with Expectations Neutral to Mild Market reaction might be muted as the data confirms existing economic expectations. However, it still contributes to the overall economic narrative. It’s crucial to remember that the market reaction isn’t always straightforward. Other factors, including global events, earnings reports, and overall market sentiment, also play a role. However, jobless claims remain a key indicator to watch, especially in the current economic climate. Actionable Insights: Preparing for Economic Events in Crypto So, how can you, as a crypto enthusiast or investor, navigate these economic calendar crypto events effectively? Here are some actionable insights: Stay Informed: Keep a close watch on economic calendars and news sources. Know when these announcements are scheduled and be prepared for potential market movements. Manage Risk: Economic events can trigger volatility. Consider adjusting your portfolio risk accordingly. This might involve reducing exposure to highly volatile assets or using hedging strategies. Analyze Speaker Statements: Don’t just look at the headlines. Read or listen to the full speeches or detailed summaries to understand the nuances of what Fed and ECB officials are saying. Diversify Your Portfolio: Diversification can help mitigate the impact of market volatility. Don’t put all your eggs in one basket. Consider Technical Analysis: Use technical analysis tools to identify potential support and resistance levels for your favorite cryptocurrencies. This can help you anticipate price movements around economic announcements. This week’s crypto market events are poised to be significant. By staying informed, understanding the potential impact of federal reserve speakers and jobless claims impact , and preparing your strategy, you can navigate the volatility and potentially capitalize on opportunities. The key is to be proactive and informed. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Ethereum Foundation new co-executive responds to Vitalik Buterin’s latest RISC-V proposal
body: Ethereum Foundation’s new co-executive director Tomasz K. Stańczak says Buterin’s proposals are meant to spark discussions and invite scrutiny regarding the network’s future goals and breakthroughs. In a recent post following Buterin’s previous proposal on replacing Ethereum ( ETH ) Virtual Machine with RISC-V to improve long-term scalability, Stańczak said that under the change in leadership, the Foundation will shift its focus from research and development to working on Layer 1 scaling, Layer 2 support, optimizing user experience, and interoperability. This includes improving the network under the new protocol upgrades, such as the upcoming Pectra upgrade, Fusaka and Glamsterdam. Our discussions about the Layer 1 scaling roadmap have been extensive, and the feedback so far suggests that the community appreciates our ambition. Turning that ambition into reality now depends on the focus of the core development teams and researchers. Following the recent… — Tomasz K. Stańczak (@tkstanczak) April 20, 2025 As a result, Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin will have a relatively smaller role in the network’s daily operational work. Instead, Buterin will be focusing his efforts on network-related research initiatives. “We aimed, among other things, to free more of Vitalik’s time for research and exploration, rather than day‑to‑day coordination or crisis response. Each time Vitalik shares insights or communicates a direction, he accelerates major long‑term breakthroughs,” said Stańczak. Price chart for Ethereum in the past few hours of trading, April 21, 2025 | Source: crypto.news You might also like: Vitalik Buterin responds to security concerns over new Pectra upgrade Stańczak went on to praise Buterin for his recent proposal on RISC‑V and zkVMs which he claimed has “advanced promising avenues.” Moreover, he also stated that Buterin’s proposals on privacy has helped realign the community with the network’s core values. However, he took the opportunity to remind community members that although Buterin’s proposals hold significant impact, they are designed to spark conversations and should not be treated as final decisions. In fact, he emphasized that the community could very well refine proposals or even reject them outright. “I want to make clear that Vitalik’s proposals will always carry weight, but they are intended to start conversations and encourage progress in difficult research areas,” continued Stańczak. On April 20, Vitalik Buterin shared a proposal on the Ethereum Magicians forum where he advocated for switching the Ethereum Virtual Machine in favor of RISC-V, an open-source instruction set architecture. He believed the change could greatly improve the network’s efficiency, especially in terms of for zero-knowledge-based scaling. The proposal was published only a few days prior to the network’s latest upgrade, which is set to go live on May 7. Read more: Vitalik Buterin proposes replacing Ethereum’s EVM with RISC-V for better scalability

title: ByBit Hack Update: Tracing the $1.4 Billion Stolen Crypto Funds
body: The post ByBit Hack Update: Tracing the $1.4 Billion Stolen Crypto Funds appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Two months after the biggest crypto hack in history , a fresh update from Bybit CEO Ben Zhou has brought a ray of hope. Out of the $1.4 billion in stolen ETH, 68.57% of the funds remain traceable, while 3.84% have been frozen. However, 27.59% have gone dark—likely laundered through mixers and bridges. Bybit Hack: What Happened To Stolen Crypto? On February 21, 2025, North Korea’s Lazarus Group exploited a free storage software tool used by Bybit, leading to the theft of 500,000 ETH. It marked the largest-ever crypto heist. Movement of the Funds After the hack, most of the stolen ETH was converted into Bitcoin via Thorchain: 432,748 ETH (~$1.21B) swapped into BTC. 342,975 ETH (converted into 10,003 BTC ) distributed across 35,772 wallets. 944 BTC (~$90M) passed through Wasabi Mixer. Some funds also flowed through CryptoMixer, Tornado Cash, Railgun, and bridging services like LiFi, Stargate, and SunSwap. Currently, 5,991 ETH (~$16.7M) is still sitting on Ethereum, spread across 12,490 wallets. Bybit’s Response: Lazarus Bounty Program To track stolen assets, Bybit launched lazarusbounty.com , calling on blockchain analysts and bounty hunters. So far, 5,443 reports have been submitted, but only 70 were deemed valid. The exchange urges more experts to join the investigation. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : UK Minister’s X Account Hacked to Promote Fake ‘House of Commons’ Crypto , Crypto Hacks on the Rise According to DeFiLlama , over $11.25 billion has been hacked from the crypto sector to date. In February 2025 alone , losses hit $1.464 billion , including the Bybit attack. April has already seen at least $12.5 million in hacks, including: ZKsync ($5M) KiloEx ($7.5M) UPCX (undisclosed) Bottom Line The Bybit hack update reveals a sophisticated laundering strategy by Lazarus Group and highlights the growing security threats facing the crypto space. title: Stablecoin Giant Circle Is Launching a New Payments and Remittance Network
body: Circle, the firm behind the $60 billion USDC stablecoin, is launching a new payments and cross border remittance network on Tuesday — the company’s “next product move” — from its plush New York City headquarters , high on the 87th Floor of One World Trade Center. The launch event is aimed at banks, fintechs, payment service providers, remittance providers and USDC strategic partners. It will feature Circle CEO Jeremy Allaire sharing his vision for the stablecoin giant’s next move within the payments space, according to an invite seen by CoinDesk. New and incipient regulations around the globe are opening up the stablecoin space, where Circle has shared the limelight with larger rival Tether. It makes sense then that Circle — a firm that has successfully pivoted during its years in the crypto space — should look to consolidate its position and return to its roots as a payments company. “Circle is launching a payments network that is initially targeting remittances but is ultimately aiming to rival Mastercard and Visa," said a person familiar with the plans. Stablecoins have reached an adoption level where the technology could disrupt global money transfers in a way similar to WhatsApp and international calls, VC firm Andreessen Horowitz said in recent report. In a recent interview, crypto custody tech specialists Fireblocks pointed to billions being moved around by payments services providers doing things like cross border payments using stablecoins like USDC and USDT. Circle was in the news most recently, after the firm announced plans to go public in the U.S., only to postpone the date of its IPO thanks to choppy and uncertain market conditions. Circle did not immediately respond to requests for comment.

title: Struggling Bitcoin Miners Face Dire Hashprice Plunge: Is Profitability Vanishing?
body: The world of Bitcoin miners is facing a significant shake-up. While Bitcoin prices have shown resilience, a critical metric that directly impacts miner revenue – hashprice – has plummeted to levels not seen in five years. This alarming drop is squeezing profit margins and pushing many miners dangerously close to their breakeven points. Are we witnessing a critical juncture for the Bitcoin mining industry? Let’s dive deep into the factors contributing to this pressure and what it means for the future of Bitcoin. What is Hashprice and Why Does it Matter for Bitcoin Miners? Imagine you’re running a business, and suddenly, the price you get for your product drops significantly, even though your operating costs remain high or are even increasing. This is precisely the situation Bitcoin miners are currently facing. Hashprice, in simple terms, is the dollar-denominated revenue a miner earns for every petahash per second (PH/s) of computing power they contribute to the Bitcoin network. It’s a crucial indicator of mining profitability. Think of it this way: Hashrate: This is the total computational power being used to mine Bitcoin. It’s like the collective effort of all miners securing the network. Hashprice: This is the reward for that effort, expressed as dollars earned per unit of hashrate (PH/s). According to data from HashRate Index, cited by CoinDesk, hashprice is currently hovering around a worrying $44.00 per PH/s. This figure is precariously close to the lows observed in August 2024 and represents a five-year nadir. To understand the severity, consider the factors at play that are driving this downward pressure. The Perfect Storm: Factors Squeezing Miner Profitability Several converging factors are creating a challenging environment for Bitcoin miners , eroding their miner profitability despite relatively stable or even increasing Bitcoin prices. Let’s break down these key pressures: Increased Competition: The Bitcoin mining landscape is becoming increasingly competitive. More miners are joining the network, especially as Bitcoin gains wider adoption. This increased competition means a smaller slice of the Bitcoin reward pie for each miner. Rising Bitcoin Mining Difficulty: The Bitcoin network’s difficulty adjustment mechanism automatically increases the difficulty of mining new blocks to maintain a consistent block creation time of approximately 10 minutes. As more miners join, difficulty rises, requiring more computational power to earn the same amount of Bitcoin. This translates to higher operational costs. Lower Transaction Fees: Transaction fees, which miners also earn alongside block rewards, have become less predictable and are often lower than during peak bull market periods. This reduces the overall revenue stream for miners. Surging Energy Costs: Energy is a primary operating expense for Bitcoin miners . Global energy prices have been volatile and, in many regions, have surged. Higher energy costs directly eat into miner profit margins, especially for those using older, less efficient mining hardware. Breakeven Point: Are Bitcoin Miners Operating on Thin Ice? The combination of declining hashprice and rising operational costs is pushing many Bitcoin miners closer to their breakeven point. The breakeven point is the price at which a miner’s revenue exactly equals their total costs. Operating below this point means incurring losses. The breakeven point varies significantly depending on several factors, including: Mining Hardware Efficiency: Miners using older, less energy-efficient ASIC miners face higher electricity costs per Bitcoin mined, leading to a higher breakeven point. Newer, more efficient hardware offers a significant advantage. Electricity Costs: Miners with access to cheap electricity sources (e.g., renewable energy, regions with lower energy tariffs) have a lower breakeven point compared to those in areas with expensive electricity. Operational Efficiency: Factors like cooling systems, maintenance, and overall farm management also impact operational costs and the breakeven point. While some miners, particularly those with access to cheap energy and efficient hardware, may still be operating slightly above breakeven, the current hashprice environment leaves little room for error. They are certainly far from the lucrative profitability levels experienced during the 2021 bull run. The Valkyrie Bitcoin Miners ETF (WGMI): A Reflection of Miner Struggles The challenges faced by Bitcoin miners are mirrored in the performance of publicly traded mining companies and related investment vehicles. The Valkyrie Bitcoin Miners ETF (WGMI), which tracks the performance of companies involved in the Bitcoin mining industry, is a stark indicator. It has plummeted by a significant 50% year-to-date. This dramatic drop reflects investor concerns about the declining miner profitability and the overall health of the mining sector. This ETF’s performance serves as a tangible example of the pressure the entire mining ecosystem is under. When mining companies struggle, their stock prices suffer, and ETFs like WGMI, which are designed to provide exposure to this sector, naturally reflect these downturns. Navigating the Storm: What’s Next for Bitcoin Mining? The current situation presents both challenges and potential opportunities for the Bitcoin mining industry. Here are some key aspects to consider: Consolidation: Periods of low profitability often lead to industry consolidation. Less efficient miners may be forced to shut down or be acquired by larger, more efficient operations. This can lead to a more streamlined and resilient mining sector in the long run. Technological Innovation: The pressure on miner profitability incentivizes innovation in mining hardware and energy efficiency. We may see faster adoption of next-generation ASIC miners and greater exploration of renewable energy sources to reduce operational costs. Strategic Energy Sourcing: Miners are increasingly looking for locations with abundant and cheap energy, including stranded energy sources or regions with favorable renewable energy policies. This geographical diversification can help mitigate energy price risks. Hedging Strategies: Sophisticated mining operations may employ hedging strategies to manage Bitcoin price volatility and energy cost fluctuations, providing more predictable revenue streams. Is This a Moment of Fear or Opportunity? For some Bitcoin miners , the current low hashprice environment is undoubtedly a moment of fear . The squeeze on profit margins is real, and survival depends on efficiency, access to cheap energy, and sound financial management. However, for others, particularly those with strong balance sheets and efficient operations, this period could represent an opportunity . Here’s why: Reduced Competition: As less efficient miners are forced to exit, the remaining miners may experience less competition and a potential rebound in hashprice if Bitcoin prices remain stable or increase. Acquisition Opportunities: Financially strong miners may find attractive acquisition opportunities, acquiring assets and hashrate from struggling competitors at discounted prices. Long-Term Positioning: Miners who can weather this storm and continue to operate efficiently will be well-positioned to benefit from the next Bitcoin bull market and potential future increases in hashprice . Actionable Insights for Crypto Enthusiasts and Investors Understanding the dynamics of Bitcoin miner profitability is crucial not just for miners themselves, but also for crypto enthusiasts and investors: Monitor Hashprice: Keep an eye on hashprice as a key indicator of mining health and potential pressure points in the Bitcoin ecosystem. Track Mining ETFs: Follow the performance of Bitcoin mining ETFs like WGMI to gauge investor sentiment and the overall health of the mining sector. Assess Mining Company Performance: If you are interested in investing in crypto mining, research individual mining companies, focusing on their efficiency, energy costs, and financial stability. Understand Bitcoin Fundamentals: A strong understanding of Bitcoin’s mining mechanism, difficulty adjustments, and economic incentives is essential for navigating the crypto space effectively. Conclusion: Navigating the Volatile Waters of Bitcoin Mining The current dip in hashprice to a five-year low presents significant challenges for Bitcoin miners . Rising competition, increased difficulty, lower fees, and surging energy costs are creating a perfect storm, squeezing profit margins and pushing many towards breakeven. While this situation is undoubtedly concerning, it also fosters innovation, consolidation, and strategic adaptation within the mining industry. For those who can navigate these volatile waters, the long-term prospects of Bitcoin mining, driven by the fundamental strength of Bitcoin itself, remain compelling. The coming months will be crucial in determining how the mining landscape evolves and how miners adapt to this new reality. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: A Blow to the Dollar: Russia Reaches Historic Milestone by Paying for Over Half of Its Imports in Rubles
body: According to the Central Bank of Russia, 53.5% of all imports to the country were paid for with Russian rubles in February, marking a historic record. Currencies from unfriendly countries, including the U.S. dollar, accounted for only 17.2%, representing a success for a nation facing unilateral sanctions from the U.S. government. Russia Pays Imports Mostly

title: Key XRP Timelines That Could Trigger Market Shift
body: Crypto analyst Zach Rector has published an updated XRP timeline on social media platform X, outlining a series of significant geopolitical, economic, and regulatory events that he believes will coincide with a shift in market sentiment. Rector suggests these developments may collectively signal the end of a prolonged period of market uncertainty, with specific implications for XRP. 🚨XRP Timeline Update 🚨 4/24- Ukraine Mineral Rights Deal 4/30- Q1 2025 GDP Release 4/30- 3 ProShares XRP ETF's Go LIVE 5/7- Fed Interest Rate Decision 5/13- April CPI 6/18 Fed Interest Rate Decision (Cut Likely) In addition to these events on the calendar we know the… — Zach Rector (@ZachRector7) April 18, 2025 April and May Mark Critical Dates for Market Movement Rector’s timeline begins with an event scheduled for April 24, which involves a mineral rights deal in Ukraine. Although he does not elaborate on the nature of this agreement or its direct connection to digital assets, including this event in his timeline indicates that he views it as geopolitically relevant. He then highlights April 30 as a particularly active day. On that date, the U.S. government is expected to release GDP data for the first quarter of 2025. Also scheduled for April 30 is the launch of three ProShares exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tied to XRP. This marks the first time multiple XRP-based ETFs will begin trading simultaneously, potentially broadening access to the asset for institutional and retail investors through traditional financial platforms. Another major economic update is set for May 7, when the Federal Reserve is expected to announce its decision on interest rates. This will be followed on May 13 by the release of April’s Consumer Price Index (CPI) data, providing further insight into inflation trends. Interest Rate Policy and Economic Data Remain in Focus Rector also points to June 18 as a critical date, as the Federal Reserve is expected to deliver another interest rate decision, with a potential rate cut considered likely at that time. These monetary policy decisions and economic indicators, such as GDP and CPI, are key drivers in shaping investor appetite for risk assets, including cryptocurrencies. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 The emphasis on macroeconomic triggers shows Rector’s view that broader economic policy remains integral to the environment in which XRP and other digital assets operate. He suggests a more favorable investment climate may return as the market moves past these uncertain periods. Legal Resolution and Regulatory Milestones Expected Alongside these macroeconomic events, Rector adds that several ongoing developments could influence XRP’s position in the market. He asserts that Donald Trump will continue to sign new trade agreements, though he does not cite specific deals. He also states that the legal case between the Securities and Exchange Commission and Ripple is now concluding, though no exact end date was provided. Rector predicts the continued rollout of XRP-related ETFs and anticipates that stablecoin regulations will be finalized by August. The conclusion of the Ripple case could have implications for the legal classification of XRP, while new ETFs and regulatory clarity could contribute to improved investor confidence and institutional participation. Rector characterizes the current market phase as “maximum uncertainty and fear,” but he believes this period is about to end. According to him, the combination of macroeconomic events and XRP-specific milestones will usher in a renewed “risk on” environment, suggesting a return of investor confidence and speculative capital. In his concluding remarks, Rector encourages followers to “lock in” their positions, implying that the present moment may represent a favorable entry point for investors in XRP. title: Metaplanet Boosts Bitcoin Holdings to 4,855 BTC with $28.2M Purchase, Eyes 10,000 BTC by 2025
body: Metaplanet Inc., a publicly listed company on the Tokyo Stock Exchange, has announced the acquisition of an additional 330 Bitcoin at an average price of $85,454 per BTC, valued at approximately $28.2 million. This purchase increases Metaplanet's total Bitcoin holdings to 4,855 BTC, now worth over $414.5 million. The acquisition is part of Metaplanet's ongoing Bitcoin Treasury Operations, reflecting the company's 'Japanese Strategy' to accumulate Bitcoin amidst market uncertainty. This move aligns with their broader goal to reach 10,000 BTC by the end of 2025, as part of their Bitcoin treasury strategy. This is the third purchase Metaplanet has made this month, positioning them as the tenth-largest public holder of Bitcoin. title: XRP Price Prediction For April 21, 2025
body: XRP is currently trading at $2.1288 marking a 2.61% daily gain and signaling a potential shift in market structure . Across the daily, 4-hour, and 15-minute charts, XRP is forming bullish patterns supported by rising momentum. Technical indicators like Bollinger Bands and MACD are aligning, pointing toward an imminent breakout. With the price consolidating near key resistance zones, traders are watching closely for entry opportunities in both short- and mid-term positions. Daily Chart Insights On the daily chart, XRP is pressing against the Bollinger Bands’ midline, which serves as dynamic support for around $2.05. The upper band sits at $2.23, acting as the next resistance zone, while $1.87 remains the key support. The MACD is beginning to curl upward, suggesting early bullish momentum is returning. Though not yet confirmed, this MACD formation often precedes strong continuation when paired with narrowing Bollinger Bands. These signals suggest that the price is coiling and may soon expand in favor of the bulls. 4-Hour Chart Structure The 4-hour chart shows signs of steady accumulation. The price has rebounded from $1.90 and is now testing the Bollinger midline. The MACD histogram has flipped green, showing growing buyer interest. The structure resembles a forming flag or pennant, often seen before continuation moves. If XRP breaks above its short-term resistance near $2.15, a quick rally toward $2.23 could follow. This timeframe supports the idea that momentum is building underneath the daily chart’s more macro-level resistance. 15-Minute Chart Confirmation The 15-minute chart adds clarity to the bullish narrative. XRP is forming an ascending triangle—typically a bullish continuation pattern. The price is consistently setting higher lows while pressing against the $2.15 resistance. The MACD line is above the signal line, and histogram bars are extending positively. Volume is gradually rising, which adds conviction to the setup. If this triangle breaks to the upside, it would provide a strong intraday signal and confirm a higher timeframe analysis. Technical Indicators in Agreement Across all timeframes, Bollinger Bands are tightening, a precursor to volatility expansion. On shorter timeframes, MACD has already flipped bullish. The alignment of structure and indicators suggests increasing buying pressure. The convergence of price at mid-band levels and the formation of higher lows reinforce the setup for a bullish move. These signals don’t guarantee a breakout, but they offer a favorable context for a calculated position. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Market Environment Beyond the charts, XRP remains in a recovery phase. Market confidence is improving due to better clarity in its regulatory and institutional positioning. Ripple’s growing role in global payment infrastructure enhances the coin’s longer-term value proposition. While these factors aren’t immediate price drivers, they help sustain demand and sentiment—both crucial for trend continuation in assets like XRP. Trade Setup and Price Forecast Today’s setup provides a high-probability trading opportunity. A confirmed break above $2.15 would be a strong buy signal, ideally entered once the 15-minute candle closes above that level with volume support. From there, the first profit target (TP1) lies at $2.23, where daily resistance meets the Bollinger Band ceiling. If momentum carries, the second profit target (TP2) is $2.45, a prior supply zone. For protection, a stop-loss at $2.01 balances risk against the trade’s structure and volatility. This configuration offers a favorable risk-reward setup for both intraday and short-swing traders. Prediction For Today XRP is likely to break above the $2.15 level today, driven by consistent higher lows, strengthening MACD signals, and tightening volatility bands. If the breakout is confirmed, the price is expected to rally first toward $2.23 and possibly extend to $2.45 in the short term. This forecast is supported by synchronized signals across multiple timeframes, suggesting that the market is preparing for expansion after a period of consolidation. Traders should watch for volume-backed breakout confirmation before entering, as today’s momentum could define the week’s direction. title: Soaring Gold Prices Explode to Record Highs: Trump’s ‘Golden Rule’ Sparks Frenzy
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts and finance aficionados! While the digital realm of cryptocurrency keeps us on our toes, something monumental is happening in the world of traditional assets. Gold, the age-old safe haven, is making headlines and not just trickling, but exploding to unprecedented heights. We’re talking about a new record high , folks! The spot price of gold has rocketed to a staggering $3,364.29 per ounce, with futures trading even higher at $3,375.90 per ounce on the New York Mercantile Exchange. What’s fueling this golden blaze? Buckle up as we dive into the details, and it might just surprise you – it involves none other than former U.S. President Donald Trump and his ‘golden rule’. Unpacking the Record High Gold Price Surge Let’s get straight to the heart of the matter: why is gold suddenly shining brighter than ever? The surge seems to be directly linked to a rather provocative social media post by Donald Trump. In a tweet that sent ripples across financial markets, Trump declared, “Remember the golden rule of negotiating: He who has the gold makes the rules.” Now, you might be thinking, “What does a tweet have to do with gold prices?” Well, in today’s interconnected and highly sensitive markets, a statement from a figure as influential as Donald Trump can act as a significant catalyst. Here’s a breakdown of why this tweet might have triggered such a dramatic gold price increase: Psychological Impact: Trump’s statement, whether intended or not, reinforces gold’s traditional role as a store of value and power. It plays into the long-held belief that in times of uncertainty or negotiation, those holding gold have the upper hand. Market Sentiment: Such a bold declaration from a prominent political figure can sway market sentiment, especially among investors who are already considering gold as a safe haven amidst economic or geopolitical uncertainties. Fear of Inflation/Economic Instability: The phrase “He who has the gold makes the rules” can be interpreted as a nod towards potential economic instability or a shift in global power dynamics, prompting investors to flock to gold as a hedge against these risks. Essentially, Trump’s tweet acted like a match to dry tinder, igniting existing anxieties and reinforcing gold’s allure as a safe and powerful asset. This isn’t just about a simple price fluctuation; it’s a psychological play amplified by social media in the modern financial landscape. The ‘Golden Rule’ and Its Market Implications Trump’s ‘ golden rule ‘ tweet isn’t just a catchy phrase; it taps into centuries of economic and political thought where gold has held a central position. Historically, gold has been synonymous with wealth, power, and stability. Think about the gold standard, national gold reserves, and the phrase “as good as gold.” Trump’s statement re-emphasizes this historical significance, especially in the context of negotiations and power dynamics. But what are the real-world implications for investors and the broader market? Increased Investor Interest: The tweet and subsequent media coverage are likely to draw even more attention to gold as an investment . Investors seeking safe havens, especially those less familiar with the complexities of cryptocurrency, might find gold’s tangible nature and historical track record appealing. Potential for Further Price Appreciation: If the initial surge is driven by sentiment and renewed interest, it could create a self-fulfilling prophecy. As more investors buy gold, driven by the narrative of its enduring value, the price could continue to climb. Geopolitical Uncertainty Amplifier: Trump’s statement comes at a time of significant global geopolitical tensions. In such times, gold traditionally performs well as investors seek refuge from market volatility and economic uncertainties linked to international conflicts or political instability. However, it’s crucial to remember that market reactions to social media, especially political statements, can be volatile and sometimes short-lived. While the immediate impact is undeniable, the long-term sustainability of this gold rally will depend on broader economic factors and investor behavior beyond just a single tweet. Is Now the Time for Gold Investment? With gold hitting a record high and market sentiment seemingly bullish, the million-dollar question is: should you invest in gold now? There’s no straightforward answer, as every investment decision should align with individual financial goals and risk tolerance. However, let’s consider some points to help you make an informed decision: Pros of Investing in Gold Now Cons of Investing in Gold Now Safe Haven Asset: Gold is historically a reliable safe haven during economic downturns and market volatility. Inflation Hedge: Gold is often seen as a hedge against inflation, maintaining its value when fiat currencies lose purchasing power. Diversification: Adding gold to an investment portfolio can enhance diversification and reduce overall risk. Momentum: The current price surge indicates strong momentum, which could attract further investment and drive prices higher. High Entry Point: Buying at a record high means you’re entering the market when prices are already elevated, increasing the risk of a potential correction. No Yield: Unlike stocks or bonds, gold doesn’t generate income (dividends or interest). Returns are solely based on price appreciation. Volatility: While seen as stable, gold prices can still be volatile, especially in response to market sentiment and speculative trading. Storage and Security: Physical gold requires secure storage and insurance, adding to the cost of investment . Before jumping into gold investment , consider your own financial situation, risk appetite, and investment goals. Diversification is key, and while gold can be a valuable part of a balanced portfolio, it shouldn’t be the only component. Consult with a financial advisor to tailor a strategy that’s right for you. Donald Trump, Market Movers, and the Future of Gold The incident highlights the powerful influence of public figures, especially in the age of social media, on market movements. Donald Trump , even out of office, continues to be a significant market mover. His ‘ golden rule ‘ tweet, whether a calculated move or a casual remark, has demonstrably impacted the gold price . Looking ahead, the future of gold prices will depend on a complex interplay of factors: Global Economic Conditions: Economic growth, inflation rates, and interest rate policies will continue to be major drivers of gold prices. Geopolitical Events: Escalating tensions, trade wars, and political instability typically boost gold’s safe-haven appeal. Central Bank Policies: Central banks’ gold reserves and monetary policies can significantly influence gold markets. Investor Sentiment: Overall market sentiment, driven by factors like social media trends and influential figures, can create short-term volatility and long-term trends. While Trump’s tweet provided an immediate catalyst, the underlying fundamentals of supply, demand, economic stability, and investor confidence will ultimately determine the long-term trajectory of gold prices. Keep a close watch on these broader economic indicators and geopolitical developments to understand where gold might be headed next. Conclusion: Gold’s Golden Moment – Hype or Sustainable Surge? The record high gold prices are undoubtedly grabbing attention. Fueled by Donald Trump ’s ‘ golden rule ‘ tweet, the surge underscores gold’s enduring appeal as a safe-haven asset in uncertain times. Whether this is a fleeting moment of hype or the start of a sustained bull run remains to be seen. For investors, it’s a reminder of gold’s role in portfolio diversification and its potential as a hedge against economic turbulence. However, as with any investment , due diligence, understanding your risk tolerance, and considering long-term financial goals are paramount before diving into the golden glow. To learn more about the latest market trends, explore our articles on key developments shaping the financial landscape.

What will the price of Ethereum be in 2025? As per our Ethereum price prediction 2025, the ETH price could reach a maximum of $5,925. Will Ethereum hold onto its tag of the largest altcoin in the emergence of newer protocols? With its dominance in DeFis, NFTs, and widespread prominence, Ethereum will continue to hold the crown of the largest altcoin. With the merger with ETH 2.0, Ethereum’s hold would further grow stronger. Will Ethereum find more NFTs, DeFis, and other projects employing its network with ETH 2.0? Yes, the Ethereum network will eventually welcome more projects to be built on its chain following its merger. It will also receive many improvements that will fundamentally strengthen the chain. Is Ethereum a good investment? As the altcoin season begins, the short-term gains make Ethereum a lucrative buying option. However, the long-term promises of this programmable blockchain make it a viable long-term crypto investment. How much would the price of Ethereum be in 2040? As per our latest ETH price analysis, Ethereum could reach a maximum price of $123,678. How much will the ETH coin price be in 2050? By 2050, a single Ethereum price could go as high as $255,282. title: Bitcoin Surges Past $87,000 as Market Optimism Grows
body: Bitcoin surged past $87,000 due to improved market optimism. Recent developments indicate potential for further growth in Bitcoin's price. Continue Reading: Bitcoin Surges Past $87,000 as Market Optimism Grows The post Bitcoin Surges Past $87,000 as Market Optimism Grows appeared first on COINTURK NEWS .

title: Bitcoin Pushes Above $87K as Trump’s Anti-Powell Messaging Shakes Confidence in Dollar
body: Bitcoin surged past $87,600 on Monday, reaching its highest level since late March, as investor concerns mounted over former US President Donald Trump’s renewed efforts to remove Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell. The cryptocurrency rose more than 3%, erasing most of the losses triggered earlier this month following Trump’s “Liberation Day” tariff declaration that had sent shockwaves through global markets. The jump came as the dollar weakened and US stock futures dipped, with traders reacting to comments made by National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett on Friday. Trump’s Inquiry Into Firing Powell Fuels Dollar Slide and Market Anxiety Hassett said Trump is exploring whether he can legally dismiss Powell , raising fresh doubts over the Fed’s political independence. A key gauge of the dollar dropped to its lowest level since Jan. 2024, reflecting the broader unease. Bitcoin’s rebound was accompanied by a similar move in gold, which climbed to a new record high. Both assets are widely seen as hedges against inflation and systemic risk, and their gains suggest investors are increasingly positioning for potential instability in traditional markets. Trump has repeatedly clashed with Powell over interest rates and the direction of monetary policy. While the law does not allow a sitting president to fire the Fed chair without cause, a pending Supreme Court case concerning presidential authority over independent agencies has brought the issue back into focus. A ruling in Trump’s favor could raise the likelihood of political interference in central banking. White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett on Friday said President Donald Trump and his team were continuing to study if they could fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, a sign that such a move, a matter of great consequence for the central bank's… https://t.co/JN9lImo3Xl pic.twitter.com/uXCcjGRhu5 — Reuters (@Reuters) April 19, 2025 Sen. Elizabeth Warren, speaking to CNBC, recently warned that any move to remove Powell could have far-reaching consequences. “If Chairman Powell can be fired by the President of the United States, it will crash the markets in the United States,” she said. Warren, a longtime critic of Powell, said she nonetheless supports his continued tenure in order to protect the institutional independence of the central bank. Bitcoin Breaks Out as Price Rebounds Sharply From April Low Bitcoin’s momentum continued to build as it reclaimed key technical levels. Himanshu Maradiya, founder of CIFDAQ Group, said the asset had bounced back strongly from its April 20 low. It rose more than $3,000 in a single day. The move marked a 16% recovery from its 2025 low of under $75,000. “Bitcoin is breaking out, reclaiming the $87,000 mark after recovering from its early April slump,” Maradiya said, pointing to renewed bullish momentum and a potential run toward the $90,000 to $94,000 range. He added that the current rally had defied expectations of a pullback over Easter and suggested broader strength across the crypto market. The post Bitcoin Pushes Above $87K as Trump’s Anti-Powell Messaging Shakes Confidence in Dollar appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Pi Coin Price Prediction 2030: Pi Network Could Hit $314 in 5 Years

While concerns about the coin’s long-term viability continue to grow, several analysts remain positive about its future. Despite recent price dips and community frustration, Pi Network is showing surprising strength , according to long-time analyst and early supporter Dr Altcoin. Known for his steady support and honest feedback on the Pi project, Dr Altcoin says he’s never been more confident in Pi’s future than he is today. Why Pi Coin Didn’t Crash To $0.30? Over the past few months, Pi faced a tough challenge : a massive wave of token unlocks that many feared would send prices crashing. Dr Altcoin himself warned that Pi could fall to $0.30 if the team didn’t act. And yes, after unlocks began, the price slipped from $0.70 to around $0.60—but then something unexpected happened. Instead of collapsing, the price held. The reason? The Pi Core Team quietly stepped in with a supply-absorbing strategy to manage the influx of tokens hitting centralized exchanges . It worked. The price stabilized. For many, this was the clearest signal yet that Pi isn’t just another overhyped crypto—it’s built to last. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Pi Network News: 5.6M Pi Tokens Set to Unlock Today, Analyst Eyes $5 Surge , Can Pi Coin Hit $314?
